title: Colts add Philip Rivers to team for Seahawks game
snippets: The Colts elevated the newly unretired quarterback from the practice squad to the 53-man active roster Saturday, making him officially eligible to play Sunday against the Seahawks.

The Indianapolis Colts promoted 44-year-old quarterback Philip Rivers to the active roster Saturday, making him eligible to play — and perhaps start — in Sunday's crucial game at Seattle. summary: The Indianapolis Colts have promoted 44-year-old quarterback Philip Rivers to their 53-man active roster, making him eligible to play in Sunday's game against the Seattle Seahawks. Rivers, a Pro Football Hall of Fame semifinalist, was signed earlier in the week after coming out of retirement. This move comes over four years after his last NFL appearance.
